info_avion: The plane game is a game where you will have to make pushes spontaneously to get the most balloons as you can in less than 2 minutes.
info_nageur:
In the swimmer game, you will have to make regular pushes to keep the swimmer closest to the center line. 
600m run = 5 minutes
